title: ADC looking for Duo silver/gold
body: I dont care how bad you are, I need someone who plays at least 5/6 games a day, has skype and is cooperative and not toxic. I was gold 2 last season playing mid. Recently ive picked up adc and slipped to silver 5 0lp. Now im back up to silver 3 70 lp and about 11 wins in a row- message me if you want to duo! I pref if you are support, but not nessesary. I'll try to limit my games in the next few days so we are about the same elo, after that i'll start playing normally again.
